text: While this game is loosely connected to Chrono Trigger, themes that have Trigger motifs like this one serve as a good reminder that yes, this is the Chrono series. I'm still holding up that someday we will get a sequel. We're actually getting a FFVII remake, so anything is possible.
author: SupraDarky

text: Spot on. These progressions have something so special about them. Secrets of the Forest is my favorite.
author: Farai The Producer

text:
I too hold out hope that we'll get a sequel. A GOOD sequel, worthy of the series.

On that note, have you watched the fan-made Chrono Break trailer? That is definitely the style I'd want for a Chrono sequel.
author: Havlock

text: One of my favorite soundtracks. I would have been excited for Chrono Trigger 2. I wasn't for the FFVII remake.

text: @Havlock I hadn't heard about Chrono Break in a long while now, but yes that looked like right up my alley.

I love you so much Chrono Cross. I miss you. 😢

text:
I actually own this soundtrack AND Chrono Trigger's. Snatched both of them off of Amazon for 30 and 45 bucks respectively. What a steal for such a legendary pair of video game soundtracks.
